footer.subscribe_success_description: You've been subscribed to our newsletter.

errors.page_not_found_description: We are sorry but this page could not be found.

cookies.message: We use first-party cookies to enhance your experience on our website.

login.seo_description: Login to your account to continue
login.title: Welcome back
login.footer_text: By signing in, you agree to our
login.error_generic: Unable to sign in, please try again.

two_factor.title: Two-factor verification
two_factor.description: Enter the code from your authenticator app or use a recovery code.
two_factor.error_generic: Unable to verify the code, please try again.

signup.seo_description: Create an account to get started
signup.title: Create an account
signup.footer_text: By signing up, you agree to our

forgot.title: Forgot password
forgot.description: Enter the email associated with your account and we'll send you instructions to reset your password.
forgot.toast_success_description: If your email exists in our records, you will receive a reset link shortly.
forgot.toast_error_description: Unable to send reset link, please try again.
forgot.completed_description: If the email you provided is registered, you'll receive a message with a reset link.

reset.seo_description: Set a new password for your account
reset.title: Reset password
reset.description: Choose a new password for your account. Make sure it's strong and unique.
reset.toast_success_description: You can now sign in with your new password.
reset.toast_error_description: Unable to reset password, please try again.
reset.invalid_link_description: Please request a new password reset link.
reset.completed_message: Your password has been changed. You can now use it to sign in.

verify.seo_description: Verify your email address to continue
verify.title: Verify your email
verify.message: We've sent a verification link to {email}. Please open it to activate your account.
verify.toast_refresh_error: Unable to refresh your account status, please try again.
verify.toast_resend_description: Please check your inbox (and spam folder).
verify.toast_resend_error: Unable to send verification email, please try again.

email_verified.seo_description: Your email address has been verified
email_verified.toast_description: Thanks! Your account is now active.

oauth.heading: Finishing {provider} sign-in
oauth.description: Please wait while we complete the authentication process.
oauth.error_missing_email: Your provider account did not return an email address. Please ensure your email is publicly available and try again.

general.title: Profile
general.description: This information will be displayed publicly.
general.name_description: Will appear on receipts, invoices, and other communication.
general.email_description: Used to sign in, for email receipts and product updates.
general.password_required: Please confirm your password to change email
general.toast_verify_description: We sent a verification link to your email. Please verify to continue.
general.error_fallback: Unable to update your profile, please try again.

members.title: Members
members.description: Invite new members by email address.

account.title: Account updates
account.weekly_description: Receive a weekly digest of news.
account.product_description: Receive a monthly email with all new features and updates.
account.important_description: Receive emails about important updates like security fixes, maintenance, etc.

password_section.title: Password
password_section.description: Confirm your current password before setting a new one.

two_factor_section.title: Two-factor authentication
two_factor_section.description: Add a second layer of security to your account.
two_factor_section.status_pending: Confirm the code to finish setup.
two_factor_section.recovery_description: Store these codes in a safe place.
two_factor_section.password_modal_description: We need your password to show recovery codes.
two_factor_section.password_modal_description_disable: We need your password to disable two-factor authentication.

sessions.title: Sessions
sessions.description: Where your account is currently signed in.
sessions.none_description: We couldn't find any active sessions for your account.

close_sessions.title: Close other sessions
close_sessions.description: This will sign you out from other browsers/devices where your account is currently active.
close_sessions.alert_title: You will stay signed in on this device
close_sessions.alert_description: If you think someone else has access, closing other sessions is a good first step.

sign_out.title: Sign out session
sign_out.description: This will sign out the selected session.
sign_out.alert_title: This session will be signed out

account.title: Delete account
account.alert_description: Type DELETE to confirm. If your account has a password, you'll be asked to confirm it.

activity.title: Recent activity
activity.empty_description: When you perform actions like changing your password or closing sessions, they will appear here.

events.sessions_revoked: Closed {count} other session | Closed {count} other sessions

account.title: Account
account.description: No longer want to use our service? You can delete your account here. This action is not reversible. All information related to this account will be deleted permanently.

toasts.session_closed_description: That session has been signed out.
toasts.password_description: Your password has been changed successfully.
toasts.two_factor_enabled_description: Scan the QR code and confirm to finish setup.
toasts.delete_confirmation_description: Type DELETE to confirm account deletion.
toasts.delete_password_description: Please confirm your password to delete your account.

errors.password: Unable to update your password, please try again.
errors.copy: Unable to copy the recovery code.
errors.delete: Unable to delete your account, please try again.

preferences.title: Preferences
preferences.description: Choose your preferred language and appearance.
preferences.language_hint: Applies the selected language across the dashboard.
preferences.theme_hint: Match your system or force a specific look.
preferences.primary_color_hint: Choose the accent that highlights key actions.
preferences.neutral_color_hint: Control the base tone for surfaces and borders.

messages.generic_error: Something went wrong. Please try again.
messages.sessions_empty: We couldn't find any active sessions for your account.
